1117796886017036288.text: The end of LastPass, where to go now? Our community loves @Bitwarden apparently:https://www.reddit.com/r/privacytoolsIO/comments/bdfh91/the_end_of_lastpass_where_to_go_now/ …

1105134594163204102.text:
Check out a few extensions that can help keep you organized.

(Also, don't forget to clear out the old ones that no longer spark joy.)https://mzl.la/2TA3BJ9

1103383712467771392.text: We've moved! You can follow @Bitwarden's new, official Twitter account at @bitwarden => https://twitter.com/bitwarden  . See ya there!

1096896746238722050.text:
Looking for a new password manager?

@bitwarden_app has been implemented in the @Nextclouders VM since while back. The latest fix today was the last piece to make it stable. It's now reachable externally with SSL.

Try it out! https://github.com/nextcloud/vm/blob/master/apps/tmbitwarden.sh …
#lastpass #nextcloud

1086268949602488321.text: @bitwarden_app congrats on making it on this list. Great to see this application listed in the top 10https://www.fossmint.com/best-open-source-linux-software-in-2018/ …

1065095948127297536.text: My new favorite password manager: @bitwarden_app https://goo.gl/dV92fF

1027177888527917056.text:
The secure @bitwarden_app password manager is available for the #Ubuntu desktop as a Snap. Store your passwords and sync them between all your devices.   

snap install bitwarden

http://bit.ly/2MdyX4m pic.twitter.com/tJKtTOuU7p

1004321109968412673.text: After strict review we have integrated another extension into the Cliqz browser  With the #opensource password manager @bitwarden_app you can store your logins & #passwords while keeping them synced between devices:  #Data #Privacy #InternetSafety #techhttps://cliqz.com/en/magazine/password-manager-bitwarden-now-available-in-cliqz-browser …

912836725319315456.text: bitwarden went public on @Hacker0x01 today: https://hackerone.com/bitwarden  #hackerone #disclosure

851891399641501696.text: .@bitwarden_app has been added to Brave iOS. Find it in our next release! Thanks @KyleSpearrin for the PR!

1126139499845685249.text:
Bitwarden is now the second most downloaded password manager for Firefox on the Mozilla Add-ons Store. Here's to becoming number 1!
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/collections/4757633/password-managers/?page=1&collection_sort=-popularity …

1124050261989896209.text: The issue is related to a larger outage across Azure datacenters. Live updates from Microsoft can be found here:https://azure.microsoft.com/status/

1124049223027240968.text: Reminder: As long as you are already logged into your account, all Bitwarden client applications will continue to function in read-only mode while a server connection is unavailable.

1124047755771621381.text: We're investigating connectivity issues related to an outage reported at our Azure datacenters.

1110561046287319040.text: The Bitwarden RESTful API is now available for enterprise organizations. The API can be used to create custom integrations with other systems and tools for your Bitwarden organization. Read more about using the API on our help center: https://help.bitwarden.com/article/public-api/ …

1103304391208173569.text: Stay safe online. Bitwarden featured as the staff pick password manager from @Mozilla on the @Firefox addon store! https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/guides/stay-safe-online/ …

1103037199010971648.text: Bitwarden is happy to announce a partnership with cloud provider DigitalOcean to make self-hosted Bitwarden installations available as a preconfigured one-click application in the all new DigitalOcean Marketplace. More on our blog:https://blog.bitwarden.com/bitwarden-digitalocean-marketplace-7079678166cb …

1100029367479083008.text: Bitcoin (BTC) and Bitcoin Cash (BCH) are now accepted payment methods for Bitwarden products. Read more on our blog.https://blog.bitwarden.com/now-accepting-bitcoin-11bdf6e04ad1 …

1096409594384003072.text: In addition to premium memberships, PayPal is now a supported payment method for organization plan purchases.

1072924542585196546.text: Premium users now have access to new password hygiene, account health, and data breach reports. Learn more about these great new features on our blog.https://blog.bitwarden.com/account-health-reports-for-premium-users-e4accfd9576d …

1067764688107253760.text: Users with families organization plans can now upgrade and grant premium access to all members of the organization. Read more on our blog.https://blog.bitwarden.com/premium-access-for-families-organizations-7aca3c31ee63 …

1067477678733893635.text: Did you know that you can now collapse and expand nested folders/collections? https://help.bitwarden.com/article/folders/ …pic.twitter.com/0psDVEJkyO

1067154393080958997.text: Our gaming users will enjoy the latest update that now allows TOTP code generation for two-factor authentication with Steam clients.https://community.bitwarden.com/t/steam-totp-support/988/6 …

1061974567223222273.text: We are happy to announce that Bitwarden has underwent a thorough security assessment, code audit, and cryptographic analysis from experts at a third-party security firm. Read more on our blog:https://blog.bitwarden.com/bitwarden-completes-third-party-security-audit-c1cc81b6d33 …

1060915297052487680.text: With the latest updates, you can now share new and existing items to an organization as well as manage collection assignments from the browser extension, desktop apps, and CLI.

1060236498694488065.text: The latest versions of the Bitwarden web vault, browser extensions, and desktop apps include the ability to create nested folders (sub-folders) and nested collections. Learn how to organize your vault with folders from this article in our help center. https://help.bitwarden.com/article/folders/ …

1050717470074564609.text: Correction: passphrase generator is not available in the mobile apps for now.

1050716077997604864.text: Version 2.4.0 of the Bitwarden Web Vault now supports adding up to 5 FIDO U2F keys to your account for two-step login. We've also added a passphrase generator to all of our apps in the latest versions. https://help.bitwarden.com/images/two-step/u2f/config.png …

1047528698122067968.text: For our Edge browser users, the Windows 10 October update introduces bugs in Edge that make the Bitwarden extension no longer usable from the popup window. Unfortunately this issue is only fixable by Microsoft. Please see information about this issue here:https://github.com/bitwarden/browser/issues/744 …

1044984792616513536.text: New AutoFill features are now available in Bitwarden for iOS 12 and Android 9. Learn more on our blog:https://blog.bitwarden.com/autofill-improvements-come-to-ios-12-android-9-3072576c7411 …

1043174633741213696.text: Here's a sneak peak of the new iOS 12 autofill feature coming to Bitwarden. It is scheduled to be available in our next version, coming out soon.pic.twitter.com/SL2fARhaDG

1042081690099871744.text: With our latest updates, all users that belong to an enterprise organization will automatically receive access to all premium features.

1034064833153519617.text: Check out the new "Live Sync" feature now available in all Bitwarden apps. No more sync delay! Learn more on our blog: https://blog.bitwarden.com/live-sync-bitwarden-apps-fb7a54569fea …pic.twitter.com/gV9nC3qOMz

1031988318370758656.text: Custom fields are a powerful feature of Bitwarden. Learn how to use custom fields like a pro here: https://help.bitwarden.com/article/custom-fields/ …

1030516653820391425.text: Full-text search is here. Check out the new and improved ways to search your Bitwarden vault: https://help.bitwarden.com/article/searching-vault/ …

1027920148869603328.text: All Bitwarden apps now support "password history". The last 5 changes to an item's password (and hidden custom fields) will be available under "Password History" when viewing the item. This feature is helpful if you ever need to retrieve an old password that was changed.

1027568227931627520.text: The v1.29.0 update for the Bitwarden browser extension now adds support for password change detection. Changing your password on a website/service will be detected by the extension and offer to automatically update the item in your Bitwarden vault. Give it a try!

1022805527561162752.text: Have you seen it? Version 1.4.0, the latest update for our desktop app, has a new theme: "Nord". Update today and check it out!pic.twitter.com/KOK6rFjqef

1021781103273754624.text: The Bitwarden web vault version 2.0 is now available with a new layout, new design, and new features!https://blog.bitwarden.com/web-vault-v2-0-8a0b44bbdba …

1019928184597467137.text: We've re-written the web vault from the ground up. If interested, you can help test and preview the new Bitwarden web vault v2.0 today.https://github.com/bitwarden/web/issues/217 …

1019321448136085504.text: If you're interested in authoring Wikipedia articles, the Bitwarden draft could use some independent contribution: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draft:Bitwarden …

1015279722849284096.text: We've hit 2,000 reviews on the Google Play store. Thanks for the support! If you haven't already, please consider leaving us a review on the various stores our applications are listed in. They help a lot!https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.x8bit.bitwarden …

1003690886570668032.text: We heard you like dark themes! Update to the latest desktop and browser extension versions today and check out the new Bitwarden dark themes. You can adjust your application's theme under Settings.pic.twitter.com/KBQ2fJoF3X

1001483378514853890.text: We've added two new convenient ways to get the Bitwarden CLI. Linux users can get the CLI with @snapcraftio using `sudo snap install bw` and macOS users can get it with @MacHomebrew using `brew install bitwarden-cli` .https://blog.bitwarden.com/bitwarden-command-line-tool-now-available-e6184407b719 …

999627288034598912.text: The Bitwarden CLI, a powerful command-line tool for interacting with your Bitwarden vault, is now available on Windows, macOS, Linux, and a variety of package managers. Read more about its release on our blog.https://blog.bitwarden.com/bitwarden-command-line-tool-now-available-e6184407b719 …

997512880319709185.text: For those interested in using Bitwarden on the command line, we now have a public beta test running for the Bitwarden CLI application. Read more about beta testing the CLI on GItHub:https://github.com/bitwarden/cli/issues/3 …

989557034336088065.text: For our Windows friends: The Bitwarden desktop application can now be had as a UWP app through the Windows Store.https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9PJSDV0VPK04 …

987386877283065857.text: Linux users: Bitwarden is now available through the @snapcraftio store. Quick and easy install with auto-updates too!https://snapcraft.io/bitwarden

977236292814671872.text: Our latest mobile app updates now allow you to fully manage custom fields from within the app.

976822321922039809.text: The latest version of the Bitwarden desktop and browser extension apps allows you to check if your passwords have been exposed in any known data breaches using the wonderful @haveibeenpwned PwnedPasswords API by @troyhunt . Check it out!pic.twitter.com/xUdmn1XpRt

976487207623184384.text: The latest version of Bitwarden adds some great new features: 1) You can now add multiple URIs per login, along with specifying custom match detection rules for each. This can be very helpful for users dealing with subdomains. Learn more here: https://help.bitwarden.com/article/uri-match-detection/ …

972145679782043648.text: We've just launched the Bitwarden Community Forums as a place to share, discuss, and vote on product feature requests. Check it out!https://community.bitwarden.com/

968873206487703552.text: The Bitwarden desktop app is now officially released! Download and install it today for Windows, macOS, and Linux.https://blog.bitwarden.com/bitwarden-desktop-app-released-for-windows-macos-and-linux-37de846ea421 …

965969614059470849.text: The Bitwarden desktop app is almost here! For those interested in a sneak peak, we are now running a public beta test of the desktop app on all platforms. Read here for more information on how to get started:https://github.com/bitwarden/desktop/issues/13 …

953354046726950915.text: We're currently running a public beta for our Safari Extension (expected to be officially released soon, stay tuned). Check it out if you are interested in helping test and provide feedback:https://github.com/bitwarden/browser/issues/17#issuecomment-357847470 …

949386461064912896.text: Whoa! We just hit 1000 reviews on the Google Play store. Thanks for all the love! If you haven't already, consider leaving us a review on the various stores. It helps us a lot!https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.x8bit.bitwarden …

948671984967221249.text: Version 1.14 of the mobile app has been released. Lots of UI updates and performance improvements. Check it out.

939197386458566656.text: Version 1.13.0 of the bitwarden mobile app went live today. This version includes a great new feature for our Android Oreo users. 938125977061863424.text: For those that self-host bitwarden on their own servers, the v1.15.1 update is now available which reduces the minimum RAM requirements to 2GB.

928624175710986240.text: We've made some changes (improvements!) to the "Personal" organization plan (now called "Families"). Read more:https://blog.bitwarden.com/updates-to-the-personal-use-organization-plan-c3eb3839621d …
